name: fly
description: Let the drone take off from the ground

command.description: Specify the instruction to the drone

height.description: Specify the height from the ground in meters, for 'set_height' and 'take_off' command

west.description: Specify the westward location from the starting point in meters, for 'fly_to' command

south.description: Specify the southward location from the starting point in meters, for 'fly_to' command
